description: I'm the lead engineer of a team of brilliant developer advocates at the LEGO Group. I enjoy creating short films, tending to the Kubernetes cluster in my closet, and storytelling through tabletop roleplaying games.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about empowering developers and the teams they participate in. I believe that the best way to do this is to provide them with the tools and knowledge they need to succeed. I am a firm believer in the power of open source software and the importance of community in the tech industry.
